item.description:
Eehhhh - Keep it cool, dude! That's the theme for August.

http://en.wikipedia.o...)

Relax, it's all gonna be cool. No worries, man. Just be there or be square!

Don't have to be cold to be cool, just have to be cool to be cool. Dig it.

Plan to cook on site - that's the cool way to do it - unless your recipe takes more than an hour to prepare.

Directions a few days before the event to those who RSVP yes or are on the waiting list.
item.how_to_find_us: my home so you will notice me and the dogs, will send address a few days before
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes August Meetup
